pages.text: The dimensional mineshaft houses a $(thing)Djinni$() which opens up a stable connection into an uninhabited dimension, perfectly suited for mining. While the portal is too small to transfer humans, other spirits can use it to enter the mining dimension and bring back resources.

pages.title: Operation
pages.text: The dimensional mineshaft will discard any items it cannot store, so it is important to regularly empty the mineshaft, either manually, with hoppers or using a transporter spirit. Spirits in lamps can be inserted from the top, all other sides can be used to extract items.
